document.discussion_title: European Commission Directorate General for Inte : Consultations
document.topic_text: Do you want to give us your opinion on EU development initiatives and influence their direction? Take part in shaping international cooperation and development policy by responding to our consultations - we are interested in hearing your views and learning from your experience. You can give feedback during various stages the policy development process and/or participate during a public consultation concerning a specific policy proposal. Please note that the consultation period is open for a limited time period (minimum 12 weeks). Visit the 'Your voice in Europe' web portal to access these and other European Commission on-line consultations, feedback mechanisms, web fora, chat rooms and complaint procedures. No ongoing consultations Closed consultations European Commission - Directorate-General for International Cooperation and Development published this content on 22 August 2016 and is solely responsible for the information contained herein. Distributed by Public, unedited and unaltered, on 22 August 2016 07:54:07 UTC . Original document http://ec.europa.eu/europeaid/policies/consultations/consultations_en Public permalink http://www.publicnow.com/view/6492F5B42E4C02E361D5CDB136A64AD74F1E183F
